definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (´[[י]] hath grasped; LXX )Iwaxav, & )Iwaxaz; cf. also [[אֲהַוְיׇהוּ]], & cuneif. Ia-u-ḫa-zi for Ahaz, v. [[אָחָז]], and cf. further Jäger:BAS i. 467 f.)—
[[יְהוֹאָהָז]] king of Judah, son of Josiah 2Ki 23:30, 2Ki 23:31, 2Ki 23:34, 2Ch 36:1, = [[יוֹאָהָז]] v:2Ch 36:2, v:2Ch 36:4 (appar. = [[יוֹהָנׇן]] 1Ch 3:15).
[[יְהוֹאָחָז]] king of Judah, son of Jehoram of Judah 2Ch 21:17, 2Ch 25:23 = [[אֲחַזְיׇהוּ]] ([[אֲחַזְיׇה]])
